trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref><xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: データを提供、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref>と<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref>イベント。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>イベントが発生したときの値、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>変更を制御します</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>イベントが発生したときの値、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>プロパティが変更された</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: イベント処理の詳細については、次を参照してください。 [NIB: イベントの利用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)です。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: ソースを実装するときに<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>と<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>イベントを渡す`true`の`previousModeAutoSized`場合、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>と新しいモードは、自動サイズ変更モードが既に存在します</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>。
それ以外の場合に渡す`false`の`previousModeAutoSized`します。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>場合、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティがいずれかに設定されていた<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref>以外の値<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref>または<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティがいずれかに設定されていた<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>以外の値<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>または<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>、それ以外の<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: 指定する値を取得するかどうか、 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>サイズが自動的に設定されています。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>および<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>イベントのため、このプロパティに、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>または<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティ</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>のいずれかの以前の状態を具体的には関連イベント</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>では、クラスを使用してください。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property was previously set to any <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> value other than <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>場合、 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティがいずれかに設定されていた<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref>以外の値<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode"></xref>または<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>プロパティがいずれかに設定されていた<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>以外の値<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"></xref>または<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode"> </xref>、それ以外の<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。
